mapper.select: select cashbook_no, member_no, cashbook_finance, to_char(cashbook_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as cashbook_date, cashbook_loop, loop_month, cashbook_asset, cashbook_category, (select category_title from category_tbl where category_no = cashbook.cashbook_category) as CATEGORY_TITLE, cashbook_money, cashbook_content, cashbook_memo from cashbook where cashbook_date >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MONTH') and cashbook_date <=LAST_DAY(SYSDATE) order by 1 desc
select sum(CASHBOOK_MONEY) from cashbook where cashbook_date >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MONTH') and cashbook_date <=LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)
select sum(CASHBOOK_MONEY) from cashbook where CASHBOOK_FINANCE=1 and cashbook_date >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MONTH') and cashbook_date <=LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)
select sum(CASHBOOK_MONEY) from cashbook where CASHBOOK_FINANCE=2 and cashbook_date >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MONTH') and cashbook_date <=LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)
select count(CASHBOOK_MONEY) from cashbook where cashbook_date >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MONTH') and cashbook_date <=LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)
